scripts.docker-compose:dev: yarn docker-compose-load-env && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml
scripts.docker-compose:prod: yarn docker-compose-load-env && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml
scripts.docker-compose-prisma-migrate:dev: yarn docker-compose:dev exec dev yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run migrate:dev
scripts.docker-compose-prisma-migrate-initial:de: yarn docker-compose:dev exec dev yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run migrate:initial
scripts.docker-compose-prisma-migrate-reset:dev: yarn docker-compose:dev exec dev yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run migrate:reset
scripts.docker-compose-prisma-migrate-status:dev: yarn docker-compose:dev exec dev yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run migrate:status
scripts.docker-compose-prisma-pull:dev: yarn docker-compose:dev exec dev yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run pull:dev
scripts.docker-compose-prisma-push:dev: yarn docker-compose:dev exec dev yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run push:dev
scripts.docker-compose-prisma-seed:dev: yarn docker-compose:dev exec dev yarn workspace @mqs/prisma run seed:dev
scripts.docker-kill: docker kill $(docker ps -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
